00035 #define UPK_FUNC_ASSERT(A,B) \
00036     do { if(! (A)) { *((upk_errno_t *) &__upk_errno_type) = B; goto __upk_err_label; } } while(0)
00037 
00038 #define UPK_FUNC_ASSERT_MSG(A,B,...) \
00039     do { if(! (A)) { *((upk_errno_t *) &__upk_errno_type) = B; memset((char *) __upk_err_buf,0,sizeof(__upk_err_buf)); snprintf((char *)__upk_err_buf, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN - 1, __VA_ARGS__); goto __upk_err_label; } } while(0)

00150 #define _UPK_AS_STRING(A) #A
00151 #define UPK_AS_STRING(A) _UPK_AS_STRING(A)
00152 #define _UPK_DIAG_LOCATION __FILE__ ":" UPK_AS_STRING(__LINE__)
